data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Ahlada Engineers Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Price movement
data.news_body: Significant movement in price has been observed in Ahlada Engineers Limited. The Exchange, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market place so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, had written to the company. Ahlada Engineers Limited has submitted their response.

data.caption: Price movement
data.news_body: Significant movement in price has been observed in Ahlada Engineers Limited. The Exchange, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market place so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded, has written to the company. The response from the company is awaited.

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Ahlada Engineers Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Ahlada Engineers Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.
